document_data.name: Hamun Kost
document_data.mainbody: '''Hamun Kost''' was a [[Red Wizard of Thay]] of the late 15{{th}} century who specialized in [[necromancy]].
document_data.Description: Kost had pale, yellowing skin, and was rather plump. His sallow face was covered with a black, necromantic tattoo, and he wore a red [[robe]].
document_data.Personality: The necromancer did not resort to aggression unless agreements could not be made.
document_data.Possessions: Hamun Kost owned several pieces of [[silver]], [[electrum]], [[gold]], and [[platinum]], as well as a [[pearl]]. He also kept a [[scroll]] of ''[[darkness]]'' in a bone scroll case, and a ''[[ring of protection]]'' in a jeweled box.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} Kost traveled to [[Old Owl Well]] to seek out ancient [[Netherese]] [[magic]] and anything associated with it. He set up camp and his writing desk, and planned to stay here for some time. The necromancer set up camp and summoned twelve [[zombie]]s to protect him during his search. He came across a Netherese ''ring of protection'', and other items.
